main event: Multiple sightings of orange shaped objects were reported in Anita, Iowa and Topeka, Kansas on 15 June 1955.
interesting points: The object in Anita was described as orange-shaped, blue and white glowing, and changed colors from red-orange to gray and back to orange., The observer in Anita noted no sound from the UFO., The object in Topeka was described as the size of a basketball with a brilliant orange color and left a trail of light., The Topeka sighting included military involvement from a pilot., There may be connections between the sightings in Anita and Topeka, as both were observed heading in the same direction.
sighted object: orange shaped objects with colors changing from red-orange to gray
witness description: one civilian observer in Anita and one military pilot in Topeka
